title: Silver Frame
body: My silver frame isnt showing up on my loading screen when I enter a game. My friends all have them but I seem to not. Is it something to do with my client? I achieved silver 2 so im not too sure why its not working.

replies.body:
We're still rolling ranked rewards out and are hoping to have them done near the end of the month. If you don't have it by then, lets us know in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any questions.
